events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as the size does not fit and I do not want to exchange it.
The case has been categorised under Refund since the customer is requesting their money back due to the product not fitting.
A customer support agent specialized in refund requests has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand that the jacket you ordered did not fit. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket was worn or still in the original condition for us to process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 78912345. The jacket is still new, with all tags attached and I haven’t worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to ship the jacket back to us.
Thanks for the quick response and help! I have received the return label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
